title: Chemical transformation, exposure assessment, and policy implications of fluorotelomer alcohol partitioning from consumer products to the indoor and outdoor environment—from production to end-of-life
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4VA00019F, Perspective
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ivan A. Titaley
Much is known about fluorotelomer alcohols (FTOHs) in consumer products and FTOHs release to the environment. This Perspective provides some understanding of the release of FTOHs to the environment throughout the lifetime of consumer products.
